SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class ScoreController

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.ScoreController
public class ScoreController extends Object
Manages the player's score during the game.

The ScoreController class is responsible for updating the player's score in response to various game events, such as collecting money, colliding with snakes, and passing levels.

It uses the ScoreModel to track the score and updates the score view accordingly.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreController

      public ScoreController(ScoreModel scoreModel, ScoreView scoreView, Player player, MoneyController moneyController)
      Constructs a new ScoreController with the given parameters - scoreModel, scoreView, player and moneyController.

      It also adds the score view as an observer to the score model, ensuring that the score view is updated whenever the score changes.

      Parameters:
      scoreModel - the model for tracking the player's score
      scoreView - the view for displaying the player's score
      player - the player character
      moneyController - the controller for managing money items

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the player's score based on collected money items.

      The update method checks for money items collected by the player, increase the score by 100 for each collected money item, and updates the score model accordingly.

    • handleSnakeCollision

      public void handleSnakeCollision()
      Handles the event of the player colliding with a snake.

      The handleSnakeCollision method decrease the player's score by 100 when it detects a collision of the player with a snake.

    • handleLevelPass

      public void handleLevelPass()
      Handles the event of the player passing a level.

      The handleLevelPass method increase the player's score by 500 when the player passes a level.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the player's current score.
      Returns:
      The player's current score.

    • getScoreModel

      public ScoreModel getScoreModel()
      Returns the score model used by this controller.
      Returns:
      The score model used by this controller.
